subject: Re: 1912 on panel landing page
preview: Hi Lucy, Sure, we the equivalent of this page https://acoufelt.com/au/product/1912-collection/on the US site is draft, so won't load to the public. We have added in redirects to account for the diff

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Sure, we the equivalent of this page https://acoufelt.com/au/product/1912-collection/on the US site is draft, so won't load to the public. 

We have added in redirects to account for the different structure. It gets tricky because the US on the old layout has a product/page for each collection, e.g. 
Bridget, where as AU and ROW only have a single page. We will need to keep an eye on these or ideally bring some standardisation as it can get unruly to manage long term. Hope that makes sense.

Logged 5 mins to Harvest

@heath kindly check if we still need to do anything with this, thanks!

action.text: Glen Tenorio marked as Active and assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body: @heath can you check this? we dont know what page to retain. ty

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey guys,

I see that there have been 2 pages created for the US:

https://acoufelt.com/us/1912-collection/

https://acoufelt.com/us/product/1912-collection/

As we are sharing these links on global platforms it's important that they are redirected/directed to the right pages depending on their region.

We will need to respect the US' decision on the layout of the page which I believe is https://acoufelt.com/us/1912-collection/

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Level 4, 108 King William Street, Adelaide SA 5000

acoufelt.com

Please let us know if you would like further changes.
